Sage Gateshead, Gateshead, Tyne and Wear, England, UK Adjudication line-up: Quality of Performance: Jan van der Roost and Lito Fontana Programme Contest: Nick Grace Entertainment & Presentation: Richard Evans and Tom Redmond Soloists: Ian Bousfield
